diff_act: 1.display the AV status on the monitoring displays
2.display fuel parameters on the monitoring displays
3.compute the estimated position of the AV during Loss of Link using the last known AV position and the current flight path

generation1:
#step1: Step 1: analyze and extract function points
The extracted fine-grained function points: 1. display AV status and fuel parameters. 2. present last known values with report time if data link is interrupted. 3. calculate estimated AV position during Loss of Link using the last position and current flight path.

#step2: Step 2: locate the incompleteness
The spec 1 displays AV status and fuel parameters, resolving function point 1. The spec 2 presents last known AV status values during data link interruption, partially addressing function point 2 but omitting the requirement to display report time. The spec 3 calculates estimated AV position during Loss of Link, resolving function point 3. Therefore, there is an explicit absence (S1) in the specifications: the presentation of the report time.

#step3: Step 3: Detect the specific incompleteness
For S1 explicit absence, we focus on the uncovered function point regarding the presentation of report time when displaying the last known values during data link interruption. This absence is a branch coverage incompleteness as it lacks the situation to present report time when the data link is lost.

#step4: Step 4: Summary and Decision
Based on the requirement context and the absence of presenting report time with last known values during data link interruption, generate the new specification:
The TCS shall present the last reported known values with report time when the data link is interrupted.

regen.absent_element: presentation of report time during data link interruption
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall present the last reported known values with report time when the data link is interrupted.

label: When the data link is interrupted, the TCS also shall present the time at which the last AV status values were reported
absence: action of presenting the time at which the last AV status
